text: Noel Chance (born 18 December 1951) is an Irish racehorse trainer based at Upper Lambourn, Berkshire. He has trained two winners of the Cheltenham Gold Cup with Mr Mulligan in 1997 and Looks Like Trouble in 2000. ==External links== *Noel Chance's website ==References== *BBC website profile Category:Living people Category:1951 births Category:Irish horse trainers
title: Noel Chance
